page.title: 03INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content: There are currently{420,000}circuits and{400}trunk telephone switching exchanges under its control. The 210 employees of whom half live in and around Oswestry dealt with{3.7 {billion}long distance calls last year and this is growing by 10% per annum. The old electromechanical telephone exchanges are being replaced by computer controlled{"digital" {exchanges},which have no moving parts and enable telephone calls to be connected faster.{Optical fibre {systems},which transmit calls at the speed of light, and are fast replacing the old copper transmission cables. There are four large computers which keep records of all line plant and telecommunications equipment. The office employees also produce work for the London offices of the company.
